title: The Cave of Wisdom: Finest of Esoteric & Semitic Philosophy
description: The Book contains the gist of mystical teachings from Upanishads, Zen, Sufism, Kabbala, Buddhism and Taoism. Along with this, it covers the very essence of Semitic philosophy that is spread through Christianity, Islam and Judaism. The knowledge expressed through different ideologies cannot be vastly different; if the aspirant unravels the mysticism that is secretly encoded in their holy texts then truth can be found. Ramana Maharishi said, only one mirror is needed for each shave, similarly one teaching is enough for the mortal to become Immortal. The book has extensive quotes and stories said by various masters. In the end segment, every mystic concepts are arranged and explained by a story said by Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa, Swami Vivekananda, Ramana Maharishi, Wandering monk, Zen and Tao Masters. The book has many verses and stories of Upanishad exclusively translated by the author. The principal ideologies said by Upanishad Saints are shared in the book. Listen to the video so as to know the content of the book better.
author: Rajesh Nanoo
